name: sefaria
title: Sefaria
description: Unofficial Raycast extension for searching Sefaria's library of Jewish texts
author: danyeric123

commands.name: search-sefaria
commands.title: Search Sefaria
commands.subtitle: Sefaria
commands.description: Search for texts, commentaries, and sources in Sefaria

preferences.name: searchMode
preferences.title: Default Search Mode
preferences.description: Choose the default search display mode

commands.name: get-source
commands.title: Get Source
commands.subtitle: Sefaria
commands.description: Get Hebrew and English text for a specific reference

arguments.name: reference
arguments.placeholder: e.g., Exod. 17:15, Exodus 17:15, Shemot 17:15, Berakhot 14b, Rashi on Genesis 1:1

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`pnpm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`pnpm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
